net.grabsalot.dao.local

Class LocalTrack

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.grabsalot.dao.local.LocalElement
      • net.grabsalot.dao.local.LocalTrack
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICollectionElement, ITrack

    public class LocalTrack
extends LocalElement
implements ITrack
    A LocalElement that holds track specific information, and contains useful methods.
